scenes.text: Cardiff’s Gaming Society aims to bring those with common interests in gaming together. We offer the chance to meet on a weekly basis where you can play some games and socialise along the way, be it through our many consoles or online on our Discord!
We usually meet every Monday from 7:30pm in the SU! We also have occasional online games nights.
Our membership is £5.00 for the year!

At our weekly social members usually play games like Smash Bros, Mario Kart, Wii Sports and more! Afterwards we head to the Taf for some chill drinks. 

If you have a particular game or console you wanna play you can ask! We're able to see if it's in storage or if not buy it for the society.
